option.description: Internal RC oscillator, CLKOUT function on OSC2
option.name: IRCCLKOUT

option.description: External RC oscillator, CLKOUT function on OSC2
option.name: ERCCLKOUT

option.description: Primary clock is under software control
option.name: OFF

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled in hardware only (SBOREN is disabled)
option.name: SBORDIS

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled in hardware only and disabled in Sleep mode (SBOREN is disabled)
option.name: NOSLP

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled and controlled by software (SBOREN is enabled)
option.name: ON

option.description: Brown-out Reset disabled in hardware and software
option.name: OFF

option.description: WDT is always enabled. SWDTEN bit has no effect.
option.name: ON

option.description: WDT is controlled by SWDTEN bit of the WDTCON register
option.name: OFF

option.description: HFINTOSC starts clocking the CPU without waiting for the oscillator to stablize.
option.name: ON

option.description: The system clock is held off until the HFINTOSC is stable.
option.name: OFF

option.description: MCLR pin enabled, RA3 input pin disabled
option.name: ON

option.description: RA3 input pin enabled; MCLR disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: Stack full/underflow will not cause Reset
option.name: OFF

option.description: Instruction set extension and Indexed Addressing mode enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: Instruction set extension and Indexed Addressing mode disabled (Legacy mode)
option.name: OFF

option.description: Background debugger disabled, RA0 and RA1 configured as general purpose I/O pins
option.name: OFF

option.description: Background debugger enabled, RA0 and RA1 are dedicated to In-Circuit Debug
option.name: ON

option.description: Block 0 not protected from table reads executed in other blocks
option.name: OFF

option.description: Block 0 protected from table reads executed in other blocks
option.name: ON

option.description: Block 1 not protected from table reads executed in other blocks
option.name: OFF

option.description: Block 1 protected from table reads executed in other blocks
option.name: ON

setting.name: EBTRB
setting.description: Boot Block Table Read Protection bit

option.description: Boot block not protected from table reads executed in other blocks
option.name: OFF

option.description: Boot block protected from table reads executed in other blocks
option.name: ON
P1A,P1C: active high; P1B,P1D: active high
option.alias: P1A,P1C: active high; P1B,P1D: active high

option.name: P1A,P1C: active high; P1B,P1D: active low
option.alias: P1A,P1C: active high; P1B,P1D: active low

option.name: P1A,P1C: active low; P1B,P1D: active high
option.alias: P1A,P1C: active low; P1B,P1D: active high

option.name: P1A,P1C: active low; P1B,P1D: active low
option.alias: P1A,P1C: active low; P1B,P1D: active low

setting.name: SMP
setting.description: SPI Data Input Sample Phase bit

setting.name: SSPM
setting.description: Synchronous Serial Port Mode Select bits

setting.name: CKP
setting.description: SPI Clock Polarity Select bit/I2C Clock stretch

setting.name: RSEN
setting.description: : Repeated Start Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: PEN
setting.description: Stop Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: ACKEN
setting.description: Acknowledge Sequence Enable bit (Master Receive mode only)

setting.name: GCEN
setting.description: General Call Enable bit (Slave mode only)
